Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.Versioning.ObsoletedOSPlatform("android24.0", "This class is obsoleted in this android platform")]
[<System.Runtime.Versioning.ObsoletedOSPlatform("android24.0", "This class is obsoleted in this android platform")>]

Docs.summary: This annotation can be used on an InstrumentationTestCase's test methods.

remarks.para: This annotation can be used on an InstrumentationTestCase's test methods. When the annotation is present, the test method is executed on the application's main thread (or UI thread.) Note that instrumentation methods may not be used when this annotation is present.

This member is deprecated. Use
UiThreadTest instead. New tests should be written using the Android Testing Support Library.
